nodes.text: Verpine choral arrangements were choral music produced by members of the Verpine species by rubbing their legs together instead of singing. Sabine Wren was a fan of it and wrote about Verpine choral arrangements in her personal journal.

Verpine choral arrangements were first mentioned in Sabine My Rebel Sketchbook, a canon young readers book that was written by Daniel Wallace as the in-universe journal of Sabine Wren, which was first released on February 3, 2015.
